alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 3:43AM MST until January 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches, except 5 to 10 inches over the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph tonight. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands zone. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Areas of blowing and drifting snow may result in continuously covered roads tonight, and snow will blow back on to the roads very soon after they are plowed.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
